text: I ty uvidish' takzhe, chto nechestivtsy, kogda ikh privedut k ognyu, budut ponikshimi ot unizheniya iz-za okhvativshego ikh uzhasa. Oni budut smotret' ukradkoy na adskiy ogon', pugayas' yego plameni. I togda veruyushchiye skazhut: "Poistine, poterpevshiye ubytok, nesomnenno, te, kotoryye nanesli sebe vred svoim neveriyem i lishilis' svoikh suprug, detey i rodstvennikov, poskol'ku oni raz"yedinilis'". Allakh obrashchayet vnimaniye na to, chto nechestivtsy budut vechno podverzheny nakazaniyu
